Q: pywinauto is not seeing the Setup window after running an installer A:

Use the corrected backend (win32 or uia):

# Try win32 backend
app = Application(backend="win32").start(...)

# If that fails, try uia backend
# app = Application(backend="uia").start(...)

Q: Firefox version 146 on Mac Catalina 10.15.7 slows my MacBook Pro to a crawl A:

Firefox Release 146.0.1, December 18, 2025 has resolved my issue, MacBook Pro no longer hangs when Firefox is launched

Q: [Vue warn]: Unhandled error during execution of setup function A:

"It might be a good idea to check whether the Vue lifetime hook has been added to the component code. like Import { onMounted } from 'vue'."

Or is the added library properly included under the script tag in the component?
